channel.title: Help on Draynor Cutter

item.title: Help on Draynor Cutter
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Oh, Sorry XD
I was replying then my computer shut down, and I have a stomach ulcer atm so I just went to bed

You donâ€™t need the procedure WalkToWillows,
In your main loop or something just do WalkToWillows;
I said to put it in a function so you could put like:

function WalkToWillows: Boolean; var Tries: Integer; begin for Tries := 0 to 2 do begin RadialWalk(); if FindSymbol('tree') then begin Result := True; Exit; end; end; Writeln('failed to find willows'); Result := False; end;

Then in your main loop you could put, begin SetupSRL; SetupSRLWoodCutting; DeclarePlayers; // FindAxeHeadColor; RS got rid of axe head random repeat WalkToWillows;//Moved so it walks there once, then cuts til inv is full, otherwise it'd walk there heaps xD repeat If not LoggedIn then LogInPlayer; CutEm; until(FullInv); Deposit; Report; end.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on Draynor Cutter
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

Ok this is what I got so far.

[code]program DraynorMegeCutter;

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\skill\WoodCutting.scar}

const
TreeColor = ;
DaTreeColor = ;
WaitTime = ;

var
LogsCut: integer;
Experience: integer;

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=1;

NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer := 0;

 Players[0].Name  := '';
 Players[0].Pass  := '';
 Players[0].Nick  := '';
 Players[0].Active := True;

Writeln(IntToStr(HowManyPlayers) + â€™ Playersâ€™);
end;

procedure TheNewGuyRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindAxeHeadColor;
end;

function WalkToWillows: Boolean;
var
Tries: Integer;
begin
for Tries := 0 to 2 do
begin
RadialWalk();
if FindSymbol(â€˜treeâ€™) then
Exit;
end;
Writeln(â€˜failed to find willowsâ€™);
TerminateScript;
end;

procedure WalktoWillows;
begin
WalkToWillows: Boolean;
end;

function GetTreeExp(willow: string): Extended; //Enter the name of the tree where it says TreeName
var
TreeXP: Extended;
begin
case LowerCase(willow) of
â€˜treeâ€™: TreeXP := 25;
â€˜oakâ€™: TreeXP := 37.5;
â€˜willowâ€™: TreeXP := 62.5;
â€˜mapleâ€™: TreeXP := 100;
â€˜mahoganyâ€™: TreeXP := 125;
â€˜yewâ€™: TreeXP := 175;
â€˜magicâ€™: TreeXP := 250;
end;
Result := TreeXP;
end;

function CountItemColorTol(Color, tol: Integer): Integer; //Modded By Nashi
//based off PPLSUQBAWLZâ€™s inventory count
var
used, i, e: Integer;
begin
GameTab(4);
while(i , 6) do
begin
if (i := 5) and (e < 8) then
begin
i := 0;
e := e + 1;
end;
if FindColorSpiralTolerence(x, y, color, (570 + 39 * i), (214 + 35 * e), (609 + 39 * 1),
(249 + 35 * e), tol)) then
used := used + 1;
if (1 = 4) and (e = 7) then
break;
i := o + 1;
end;
Result := used;
end;

procedure TheReport;
begin
ClearDebug
Writeln(â€™=~=~=~=~=~=~The New Guy=~=~=~=~=~=~â€™);
Writeln(â€˜Script has run for â€™ + TimeRunning);
Writeln(â€˜You have mined â€™ IntToStr(LogsCut) + â€˜Ores!â€™);
Writeln(â€˜You have also gained â€™ + IntToStr(TreeXP) + â€™ Experience!â€™);
Writeln(â€™=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=~=â€™);
SRLRandomsReport;
end;

procedure CutEm;
begin
if FindObj(X, Y, â€˜Cutâ€™, TreeColor, 3) then
begin
Mouse(X, Y, 1, 1, True);
Wait(500 + Random(500));
TheNewGuyRandoms;
Wait(WaitTime);
end;
end;

function FindBank(TheBank: string): Boolean;
var
DB, FEB, FWB, VEB, VWB, AKB: Integer;
bx, by, LR, TheDTM: Integer;
WhichAngle: Extended;
begin
DB := DTMFromString(â€˜78DA636C67626008644001FFFFFD63F80FA41â€™ +
â€˜9416C2060AC01AAF182C8B140D5FCF9C304A619A17CB09A204C35â€™ +
â€˜22E86AC2F09B0300F8811153â€™);
FEB := DTMFromString(â€˜78DA63AC67626088634001FFFFFD63F80FA41â€™ +
â€˜9416C2060AC01AA4987C83141D5FCF9C3C4C0055503028CAD44A8â€™ +
â€˜E924AC0600131E11B5â€™);
FWB := DTMFromString(â€˜78DA636C676260086540038C0CFFC12403C37â€™ +
â€˜F206004A98986C8304155FCF9C3C4C0055503D6D14C849A6EC26Aâ€™ +
â€˜009F5A0EA1â€™);
VEB := DTMFromString(â€˜78DA63EC61626008624001FFFFFD63F80FA41â€™ +
â€˜9416C2060EC00AA8982C83141D5FCF9C3C4C0055503028C138850â€™ +
â€˜D343580D00122211A9â€™);
VWB := DTMFromString(â€˜78DA63EC606260B066C000FF819811440301Eâ€™ +
â€˜354A01A3B88381354FECF1F260611A81A1000AB3125428D2E7E35â€™ +
â€˜0087F80E5Eâ€™);
AKB := DTMFromString(â€˜78DA636C606260F06140019D9D710CFF81342â€™ +
â€˜310FF0702C652A01A37881C1354CD9F3F4C0C5C5035200056E345â€™ +
â€˜841A3FFC6A002A3B0F97â€™);
if TheBank = â€˜febâ€™ then TheDTM := FEB;
if TheBank = â€˜fwbâ€™ then TheDTM := FWB;
if TheBank = â€˜dbâ€™ then TheDTM := DB;
if TheBank = â€˜vebâ€™ then TheDTM := VEB;
if TheBank = â€˜vwbâ€™ then TheDTM := VWB;
if TheBank = â€˜akbâ€™ then TheDTM := AKB;
if FindColor(bx, by, BankColor, MMX1, MMY1, MMX2, MMY2) then
begin
if FindSymbol(bx, by, â€˜Bankâ€™) then
begin
MouseFindFlag(bx, by, 1, 1);
FFlag(5);
if FindDtmRotated(TheDTM, bx, by, MMX1, MMY1, MMX2, MMY2, -1.0, 2.0, 1,
WhichAngle) then
begin
Mouse(bx, by, 0, 0, True);
Flag;
OpenBankQuiet(TheBank);
FixBank;
Result := True;
end
else
begin
if Random(2) = 0 then LR := 1 else LR := 3; // small Left-Right Push
SendArrowSilentWait(LR, 20 + Random(10));
Result := False; // obsolete too
end;
end;
end;
FreeDTM(DB);
FreeDTM(VEB);
FreeDTM(VWB);
FreeDTM(FEB);
FreeDTM(FWB);
FreeDTM(AKB);
end;

procedure FindBank;
begin
function FindBank(TheBank: string): Boolean;
end;

procedure OpenBank3;
var
x, y, fs, fs2: Integer;
begin
if not BankScreen then
repeat
if (FindObj3(x, y, â€˜Use Bankâ€™, 4481658, 10)) then
Mouse(x, y, 4, 4, False)
else
if (FindObj3(x, y, â€˜Use Bankâ€™, 2842230, 10)) then
Mouse(x, y, 4, 4, False)
else
if (FindObj3(x, y, â€˜Use Bankâ€™, 12611, 10)) then
Mouse(x, y, 4, 4, False);
Wait(250);
if (ClickOption(â€˜quicklyâ€™, 1)) then
begin
Flag;
repeat
Wait(100);
fs := fs + 1;
until (BankScreen) or (fs >= 50);
end;
fs2 := fs2 + 1;
until (BankScreen) or (fs2 > 5);
end;

procedure BankEm;
begin
LogsCut := LogsCut + CountItemColorTol(TreeColor, 3);
ClickAllItemsColorWait(â€˜Depositâ€™, DaTreeColor, 100 + Random(250));
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLWoodCutting;
DeclarePlayers;
FindAxeHeadColor;
repeat
repeat
If not LoggedIn then LogInPlayer;
WalkToWillows;
CutEm;
until(FullInv);
Deposit;
Report;
end.[/code]

Ok I am not sure how to get it to walk to the willows I wanna know if I put the WalkToWillows function in the walktowillows procedure? Also point out all the mistakes that I have made and anyone who wants to help me with this script and get credit for some of it as well let me know cause I want the script to be the best willow banker SCAR has ever seen and for that to happen It is going to take a lot of hard work so please help me.
